name: A simple RAGE game 2
description:
This is a rage game with really simple controls. It can be completed by anyone who refuses to give up. 

Controls - Left mouse button or spacebar to change direction

I will soon release a version for android as well.

I wanted to make an HTML version of the game but for some reason, all I was able to get was a pink screen on itch.io

I have no idea how to fix it. So you will have to download it to play.

If you have a game idea and want me to make it for you then you can contact me here: https://www.fiverr.com/share/6V89wr

I can also make educational games for kids! Contact me here: https://www.fiverr.com/share/Bmk02b
